Summary Note:
Adèle Hermans and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Brussels. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
With a career spanning nearly 43 years, Adèle Hermans has established herself as a key player in the industry.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced she to join.
Family Background: Adèle Hermans and Sanders have been married since 1985. Adèle and Sanders have 2 children, named Chloé and Wouters.
Education Background:
Adèle graduated from Onze-Lieve-Vrouwecollege in 1976.
In 1983, Adèle graduated from KaHo Sint-Lieven – Catholic University College Ghent with a degree.
Occupation History:
Adèle Hermans is a 66 year old retired Operations Manager from Belgium.
Adèle Hermans launched her career as a Drilling Engineer at Eni Belgium NV, where she gained valuable experience from 1982 to 1985.
At ExxonMobil Belgium NV, she held the position of Reservoir Engineer from 1986 to 1991, making significant contributions to the organization.
From 1992 till retirement, she served as a Operations Manager at ExxonMobil Belgium NV, solidifying her position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 1050000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
She owns 3 exceptional properties: flat located in Antwerp, valued at approximately 984,000.00 EUR, villa located in Ghent, valued at approximately 1,950,000.00 EUR, house located in Roeselare, valued at approximately 1,240,000.00 EUR. This impressive collection showcases her flair for luxury living and investment prowess, with a notable presence in Antwerp, Roeselare and Ghent.
She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
